channel.title: Compiler Help
channel.description:
Ok So I want my compiler to Compile my Bin folder in the main folder of my server.
Here is my edited compiler that is non working atm. I figured out that ../ Is where al the class files are stored (of course) So it compiles all the files in rs2 then writes them to the bin folder. [code]@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./data/*.java pause[/code]
I took it from my rs2 folder compiler. For those of you that can't read this compiler vvv is working I DON'T NEED TO CHANGE MY JAVA!
[code]@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java pause[/code]
For some reason it says the folder can't be found.

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:2, topic:247718”]try this 1,

[quote]@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause [/quote]

if u have JDK _06 change the _07 to _06 ;D,[/quote]

Wow ppl can’t read. No wonder why every one says this community is fail ( I never said that, I just heard it.) I said my other compiler works and this one that I edited doesn’t.

That would also fail because there is no compile command executed here only the program is and it doesn’t know what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

try this 1,

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

if u have JDK _06 change the _07 to _06 ;D,

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

Ok So I want my compiler to Compile my Bin folder in the main folder of my server.

Here is my edited compiler that is non working atm.
I figured out that …/ Is where al the class files are stored (of course) So it compiles all the files in rs2 then writes them to the bin folder.

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./data/*.java pause

I took it from my rs2 folder compiler. For those of you that can’t read this compiler vvv is working I DON’T NEED TO CHANGE MY JAVA!

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java pause

For some reason it says the folder can’t be found.

Read full topic
